title: Morning Chorus: Dawn in an Old-Growth Forest
description: A 15-minute immersive recording of the dawn bird chorus in an old-growth forest. Over 12 species can be heard, including the hermit thrush, winter wren, and varied thrush.

title: Time-Lapse: Mushroom Growth Over 7 Days
description: Stunning time-lapse footage showing the explosive growth of fungi on the forest floor after autumn rain. Watch as chanterelles, amanitas, and coral fungi emerge from the leaf litter.

title: How to Read Clouds: A Field Guide
description: A practical guide to reading cloud formations for weather prediction. Covers the ten main cloud genera, what they indicate, and how to build a 12-hour forecast without any technology.

title: Night Sky Photography: From Setup to Star Trails
description: Complete walkthrough of night sky photography in the backcountry. Covers camera settings, finding dark sky locations, composition with landscapes, and creating star trail composites.
